1.1.0.en: Updated driver icon, added new capabilities: return temperature, actual modulation

1.2.0.en: Added flow cards for return temperature and actual modulation

1.3.0.en: Replaced bosch-xmpp package with own modernized implementation

1.3.2.en: Fixed issue for Homey Pro 2019 devices not being able to pair devices

2.0.0.en: Added support for thermostat valves (ETRV)! Complete rewrite of the app to manage multiple devices efficiently. Added support for child lock. Added donate links to app store listing.
